
## Properties

| ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [apiKey?](./openai-js.clientoptions.apikey.md)             | string | <i>(Optional)</i> API key in an Authorization HTTP header https://beta.openai.com/docs/api-reference/authentication                                 |
